attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Once the CD is purchased, it should be completely functional whether or not the PC is connected to the Internet and the installed software from the CD should also be completely functional without requiring any kind of online connection. I concede there may be a case for a hardware dongle, but this should be included in the package together with the CD.
The above is particularly necessary for operating systems.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
